merakiStory: Meraki is a project born from a passion for art and storytelling. The word “Meraki” comes from Greek and means “to do something with soul, creativity, and love”. Through her creations, the artist turns your most beautiful stories and precious memories into timeless works. Whether it’s a wedding, a thesis, or a birthday, she will capture emotions and life’s moments to create unique, everlasting gifts.
